snippet.title: Mega CD Longplay [139] The Amazing Spider-Man vs. The Kingpin
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: NPI

This is an updated version of the Spider-Man game for the Genesis.

I Played it on normal difficulty, finished with the good ending. There are more bad endings and they depend on what you do at the final boss scene:

01:08:01 Bad ending 1 - Mary Jane lives and Spider-Man is defeated
01:08:39 Bad ending 2 - Mary Jane dies and Spider-Man wins

01:09:44 Bad ending 3 - If during the game the time runs out

Game over videos:

01:09:58 Game over 1 - If you lose at the pinball game
01:11:14 Game over 2 - If you lose any other time -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
